name: Doannah Donut - Unfinished Diner Simulator Prototype
name_original: Doannah Donut - Unfinished Diner Simulator Prototype
description:
This was for the #SBIGJam of 2020, but unfortunately I didn't have enough time to do anything else, so this is all I could showcase for this jam.

You play as an unseen new hire for Doannah Donut, who'll handle the cooking while you take orders from the customers. Make sure not to miss any of them or they'll leave if they lose their patience. And don't expect anything like scary surprises since the game lacks it.

Since this is a prototype I couldn't do much work on, expect some bugs and not so unique charms around here. And it has a lack of sound and music, sadly. I did intend to do this to demonstrate a 3D feature I found created by TheSnidr, which is pretty good for Game Maker Studio 2. Soooo... yeah.

---Controls---

ASDW - Move

Space - Take Order/Get order to Doannah

E - Take Food/Place Food

Control - Crouch

Shift - Run

---Assets Used---

Engine: Game Maker Studio 2

3D Tool for GMS2: TheSnidr's SMF Tool

Food Assets: Modeled by Kenney

3D Models for Doannah, the diner area and the customers: Done by me

Some time later, I will give it more updates, and turn it into a proper game. I did like how this was turning out. Wish me luck on later, later updates ;w; Cuz there are stuff I do LOVE to add when I get the chance to get back to this prototype!
